law.catch_line: Order in which deeds and mortgages take effect.
law.text: All bona fide deeds of trust or mortgages shall take effect in the order that they are legally acknowledged or proved and lodged for record.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 497.
